description:
A compact bright light to illuminate the task at hand. The integrated clip makes the Radiant 170 easy to clip on a hat brim, pack strap, gear loft, or anywhere you need to shed a little light on things. Pass-through power lets you use the light while it's being charged.

  • Chip on board LED provides wide, even white flood lighting
  • Red lighting mode helps you see while maintaining night vision
  • 3 modes, white: high – 170 lumens for 2h, low – 20 lumens for 11h; red 5 lumens 18h, red flash
  • Tilting light head lets you shine your light right where you need it
  • Clip mount turns hats into headlamps and clips to pack straps with ease
  • Single-button interface is easy to use
  • Recharges via micro-USB in just over 2.5h
  • IPX4 waterproofing keeps your light shining in heavy downpours
  • Dimensions: 6 x 6.3 x 2.5cm
name: Nite Ize Radiant 170 Rechargeable Clip Light
